title: Blocky san serif ID help
content:
Can you help me out in identifying this blocky sans serif font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FoodPairings.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041244/http:/typophile.com/files/FoodPairings.jpg) | 44.64 KB |
author: dongura

comments.content:
"Based on the signage for the Cup and Saucer Luncheonette in New York". Structure seems right.  
Edmondson, James T/Duke-Regular  
 [http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=duke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041244/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=duke)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041244im_/http:/typophile.com/files/food1_4376.jpg)

Thanks DPape. Yes this seems like a match.

Don
